channel.title: learning on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in learning on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-09
item.description: Apple announces a way to buy stuff by tapping iPhones together (2 minute read) Apple is releasing a new Tap to Pay feature for the iPhone that allows people to receive payments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-27
item.description: Yahoo has built a new calendar app called Day, and it’s recruited the co-founder of Sunrise to design it (3 minute read) Day is a new standalone calendar app from Yahoo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-15
item.description: Facebook details AI that can understand videos (6 minute read) Learning from Videos is a project from Facebook that uses AI to automatically learn audio, textual, and visual representations from videos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-05
item.description: Apple imagines a foldable iPhone with a ‘self-healing’ display (2 minute read) Apple filed a patent in January for a foldable smartphone with a self-healing display that could repair dents or scratches on the screen.
